content.detailedDescription: For the last week just before midnight there has been a rather large bright star but as watching from my front porch you could see it was changing colors of red to white. so tonight i took out  small binoculars to see if it was actually changing colors or not. thinking it may be a satellite. it was to my surprise it was changing colors but i couldn't make out a shape so i went and got a telescope. to my great surprise there was a large brightly color sphere. it was flashing bright colors of red and green and white like a diamond blast. as watching it the sphere began to bend itself almost at times inwardly. the colors would change from red to green. with the background white. it reminded me of a diamond with many faucets of color. i watched for and hour . i was on phone talking to someone and was describing what i was seeing in the telescope to them. this was between 12pm to 1am. i went inside for about forty five minutes and when i returned at 2am the object had either moved higher up or had dimmed itself to where i could no longer see it with the naked eye. the night before it had to be lower in attitude because this object was much larger then tonight and could been seen easily in the sky. because there were no stars out that could been seen easily like it was again tonight and it stood out!  but tonight it was smaller but still bright and still flashing red lights. this object i have seen here on several other occasions with another smaller star near it like in was blending into one another at times. then the smaller one would fade out and could not be seen by the naked eye later. but the larger star as i saw tonight would stay. on these occasions i didnot have binoculars or a telescope to observe closer. it was amazing to watch! i was not able to photograph or video tape this. my phone camera could not capture it from the distance and not able to take a photo through the telescope. i hope to do so the next time it appears which may be tomorrow night hopefully. i will try to draw it out but all i can say would be like magnifying a round diamond that was flashing its colors but at times more red and green and folding in on itself and making it changing  its shape to almost no colors  showing. amazing!
content.summary: Star like changing colors  in telescope it was bright colors changing red green and white and sphere would bend has been here for two weeks. can be seen by naked eye of changing to red and back.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my roof with some friends on a nice summer night and my eye for some reason was drawn to this patch of night sky almost completely behind me. i just turned my head and stared there. in a split second a beautiful light appeared and at first i thought it was a plane flying too low (but the lights were too bright so it couldn't be) appear suddenly fairly low, make a weird downward and intentional descent shape in the air, and disappear. it left a trail of light behind it as it moved. i couldn't breathe for a moment, had a delayed reaction and started yelling in panic. my friend sean told me he has had the same experience, he feels randomly inclined to look somewhere as if someone is calling him there, and then he sees something. he told me about this website.
content.summary: A very odd looking light appeared, made a swift and intentional movement, and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I actually had no idea i had captured the photo. i usually take consecutive pictures of the moon, from my backyard.  so it wasn't until i reviewed and zoomed in on the photos and saw the dots assembled in a consistent pattern that i realized i had accidentally caught ufos around the moon. 

the weather included lighting, thunder, very cloudy, ominous, perfect for picture's.     

 i was preparing for the blue moon. when i inspected the photo, i was amazed. i had been meditating during the lightning hoping for ufos, maybe they heard me. 

i'm submitting both pics which i took immediately following each other, from my cell phone.
content.summary: Randomly taking pics of moon. wasnt aware captured photos until i zoomed in and saw the formations in the clouds w bright light eminating from moon

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting in her room and heard this super loud firecracker yet metallic metal steel drum boom kind of sound outside and so we looked out her bedroom window which is facing south eastern and we immediately saw a bright whiteish yellowish light aspirin sized flying and there was no noise to it, no blinking helicopter or airplane lights, didn't really look like a satellite because it was low down more and it kind of spooked us. i ran for the camera in the kitchen and came out onto the back porch. i managed to film it for a minute or so before the neighbor and his dog came out downstairs and i was only wearing a night shirt so i ended the video and ran inside. i peeked out the front door to see if it was still flying away and it was getting dimmer and headed ne. it was sighted around 9:35 pm. i videoed the object and the moon was coming up behind the small patch of forest next to the field, which i have under the object for size reference. lots of dogs are barking in the neighborhood. around 9:44pm we heard another noise like the one earlier, and at around ten minutes later noticed a cop car driving down the little dirt road next to the big empty field behind our apt complex. the cop had his spotlight on looking around and i'm guessing he was called to find out what that sound was. feeling spooked and want to keep my eye out for anything else. i'm not sure what it was but i would love to see that video super close up and figure out what it was!
content.summary: Heard a loud firecracker like metallic drum boom sound and looked outside and saw and videoed strange flying light no noise pulsating sort of

content.detailedDescription: I was at home on the deck while on the phone with my girlfriend. i was looking at the stars directly above me. i seen a very odd bright star (brighter than the moon, which was full and bright). i didn't think much of it because it wasn't moving at the moment. after sometime, i looked away at an odd shadow projected on the deck by my indoor lights. i once again looked up above me at the stars but this time i noticed an silvery haze around it as it seemed to descended to the point of being the size of a bright star to the size of my thumbnail at arm length away. after reaching its maximum dissent, the haze "dissipated" and started heading west at the speed of an airplane. after heading west for a moment, it stopped in midair, turned back on the haze and for about 10 sec it wobbled like a spinning top the was bumped. it then shot off at what seemed to be the speed of light, leaving a brief light trail behind it. i felt memorized omg while i was taking a break from typing i seen another one. it was star like and shot down with strobing lights!!!! wtf!!!! help!!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What looked like a star at first, descended with an ora of silvery white haze around it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a campout talking to some friends, while looking up at the sky. i noticed a light that seemed far away slowly move towards our position. at first i thought it was a helicopter, becuase of the flight pattern i was observing. but as it came closer there was no sound. i started getting excited and yelling to another group of friends that where in a tent but they just laughed and shrugged it off. when my attention turned back to the craft, it seemed so high up in the sky. then instantly it was directly above me and 2 others, shinning a beam of light down directly at us. it couldn't have been more then 50'ft above us. we were mezmerized by the light, then all of a sudden it shut off. once the light shut off the craft took off, straight up, really high, and then slowly made it's way south untill it dissappear ed from sight. the funny thing was right after the light went out there was a short bald man standing right beside us. my eyes went wide as i looked at my friends in disbelief. he came out of no where. he asked us if we had any smoked salmon in a russian accent. turned out he was with another group camped there. it was all just so random though.  we thought he was beamed down or something, none of us saw him walk up, we were so transfixed with the light above us. anyway, i have had several strange encounters, and witnessed lots of other high strangeness in the skys since this event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo directed light beam on group

content.detailedDescription: I walking looking for my husband, he took off upset, as im looking for him i notice a light, plane i thought, but it was different it stopped,moved,changed direction then kind of fluttered away.Best way i can describe it, like bright glowing water drop with no gravity....Now i dream
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Answering me?

content.detailedDescription: Somewhere before or around 7 pm wednesday i was standing in my drive way before a storm rolled through.  i looked up and saw what i thought may be a white piece of trash blowing in the wind of the storm and suddenly realized it was much larger and a solid shape. no flashing lights, no sound, no emission.  just a long cylinder in a slow trajectory heading south.  what made it more bizarre is the longer i watched it, i saw vibrations seeming to imminate from it in a circular motion.  even more bizarre is that it was going in and out of visibility yet keeping the same exact path.  almost like it was cloaking and uncloaking its own visibility.  clouds never got in front of it.  it finally headed over the tree line toward taylorsville.
content.summary: Solid white cylinder slowly flying and appearing in and out of visibility

content.detailedDescription: I was taking long exposures and this "object" showed up in one of my photos. i was taken back by what i had discovered when reviewing my photos!
content.summary: Bright flash ufo captured in image

content.detailedDescription: While walking home from dinner at the site above, was looking at the sky after previously observing an unusual meteor event (about six objects traveling parallel). it was also the full moon, so we were observing the sky. noticed the object hovering. it seemed very bright, as if close and at a low altitude compared to aircraft frequently observed approaching lakefront airport (knew, i tried to call them). i a familiar with navigational lights as a frequent passenger in a former employer/pilots aircraft, and from general observation living near lakefront airport, and being on the north approach to fargo airport for 10 years. there were red lights port and starboard (wrong), a variable white/green light at top, and a white strobe. we sighted it twice above the tree line between 0 and 8 degrees north of our position, first at an angle of about 45 degrees, then at a lower angle just above the tree line. craft accelerated very rapidly from stationary hover in a northward direction. it returned above the tree line, hovered, then again proceeded north. on this second sighting, i observed it make a very abrupt 90 degree course change first left/west, then right/north, inconsistent with any aircraft i have observed.  based on the luminosity of the lights, i would have expected it to be closer than it probably was, close though to emit some engine noise, but neither my girlfriend or i heard anything although there was no interfering noise that would prevent us from hearing it. i am reporting this based on the atypical presentation of its lights, its sudden accelerations and stops, and particularly the abrupt change of course exhibited at the end of the sighting. this object would have been within the immediate airspace of lakefront airport, and visibility of the tower without doubt. i actually tried to call the listed number of the after-hours airport manager, but got voicemail with a full mailbox. there were two of us present who observed all of this except the abrupt course change, which the trees obscured from my girlfriends sight just as i lost sight of it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed an airborne craft not consistent with typical aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was shooting video of a storm cloud emitting heat lightning from our back porch.  when i viewed the video i saw a streak of light that i cannot explain or rationalize.  i slowed the speed and showed it to friends.  it was recommended that i forward his to your organization.  i am including the original video from my phone. (which is upside down) the orb appears 11 seconds in. i also included video that i inverted and cropped.
content.summary: I was shooting video of a stormcloud emitting heat lightning and when i viewed the results i saw this streak of light.  i can't explain it.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching the full moon in the night sky to the south east and i was looking over towards orion's belt in the south west sky when i saw an object moving through the night sky. at first i tried to identify or rule out a plane or a satellite. it was not blinking nor have red or green lights like a plane, it it a clear sky so easily to identify. it was the size of the north star and as it tracked across the sky it went through the only cloud in the sky which proved it was in the sky and not a satellite. i came in and grabbed my iphone and took some pictures as it traveled to the south east sky. knowing iphones they do not pick up light well at night and this stands out nice and bright.
content.summary: Watched a bright object like the north star traveling through the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I observed a solid light travel south to north very high in the sky. absolutely no blinking lights. after about 18 seconds it disappeared in full open view. it did not burn out. i noticed it while looking up at a constell a tion while outside smoking a cigarette.
content.summary: Bright star like object

content.detailedDescription: Was home, and wife of neighbor called excitedly saying that there were numerous orange objects in the western sky. she and her husband were coming home from the swimming pool and saw these objects in the western sky.  my wife and i went outside and witnessed one object proceeding from due west at approx. 15% above the horizon traveling ne and disappearing behind a cloud bank northwest of our position at about 30% above the horizon.  saw two more similar spheres of same intensity traveling the same path over the next 4-5 minutes.  neighbors had previously seen several groups of these same objects traveling identical paths probably 30 objects in all with the largest single group of 7-8 orange spheres.  objects were very distant, so details of structures were not possible even though viewed through 12x binoculars.  objects were all traveling at same speed and path was straight with no variations.  neighbor, who is a retired air force test pilot said he could not identify what these were but they were definitely not commercial or military aircraft.  commercial aircraft proceeding to tampa and orlando airports were seen flying overhead during the witnessing of these spheres, so a comparison was possible.  these spheres were not aircraft.  neighbor attempted to take video on his cell phone with limited success.
content.summary: Multiple orange spheres appeared on western horizon proceeded in ne direction

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10pm tonight, i was leaving the grocery store, when i heard some people in the parking lot saying "what's going on over there?" i looked, and about one mile from where i was standing, i noticed about 10-15 orbs flying slowly and silently over the treeline.

curious, i got in my car, and drove to where these objects appeared to be, in order to get a better look. on the way there, i saw one car stopped on the side of the road, with the occupants both standing outside the car, appearing to film or photograph these objects.

as i continued to drive down the road, i eventually was directly underneath several of these objects, with the remainder of them being over to my left. i slowed down in order to get a good look as i was driving by, and was able to note some basic details. these objects were completely spherical, and glowed red. the center of the orb glowed so brightly red, that it was almost white, but the outer portion of the sphere was more distinctly red. the objects flew slowly with a slight zig-zag; some veering to the left or right, while others continued straight from west to east.

when i arrived back at my house, about 2 miles away from where i drove directly under the objects, i could no longer see them. several minutes later, my roommate arrived back home, and asked me if i had seen "the alien invasion," and recounted details similar to what i witnessed.
content.summary: Multiple red orbs sighted over davison michigan

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting off the phone with family thanksgiving night during the seahawks football game approx. 7-7:30 pm. i was hanging up the phone when i noticed a orange-red light illuminating my living room threw partially closed blinds through my sliding glass door to my porch approx. 100' - 150' high 75'- 150' away to the west. i ran over because i thought it was awfully close for a helicopter to be to the apartment complex. when i got to the window i  moved the blinds so i had a clear view of a bright orange-red orb (size like a large basketball sun-orange glowing in color) floating upward and to the north very slowly like it was scanning as soon as i got a good look it dropped down and sailed to the north along the mountain side above the tree line about 30-40 mph. until it went out of site. the whole event lasted no longer than a minute. it seemed like it was some type of probe or drone not of this world!
content.summary: Thanksgiving night right after halftime of the seahawks game. bright red-orange orb hovering outside my window.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out window at blue moon.  orange red color orb.  proceeded from se to nw then changed into completely different shape.  irregular pattern of flight.  not steady path like a plane, wild experience.
content.summary: Looking at blue moon and an orb came out of nowhere, changed shape left.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in the pool, cooling off, at about 9:30pm friday, 7/31/15, at our home in andover, ma.  we got out of the pool, and looked up at a very bright object going by in a straight line over the treetops, but seeming to be close to us.  i said--"there's no noise coming from that plane".  my husband said "maybe it's a satellite".  but we both just stared at it as it went by and realized it was like nothing we had seen before.  we are out side in our hot tub and pool a lot of nights, both summer and winter, and we observe many planes and helicopters in our area.  this object was very bright--as if the whole object was illuminated.  it did not seem to be lights from a plane.  the light was steady, not blinking, and very bright! it also seemed large and oval and entirely illuminated.   it seemed low and close to us.  it moved steadily and in a straight line.  we observed it for about 2-3 minutes.  it finally left our line of sight beyond the trees in our yard, into the east or northeast.  then 2 planes came after going in the same direction and flying low.  
we discussed if it could have been a satellite, but it was too low.  it was not a plane, because there was no sound.  we live in a very quiet neighborhood, and we are sure there was no sound.
content.summary: We saw a very bright white, soundless large craft flying across the sky for about 2-3 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was in computer room working on a school paper. it apperared on my surveillance. what the hell is that? it was egg shaped hovering not moving. seen only on screen. went outside i did not see so i took a picture of what i seen on my surveillance.  while i was watching tv screen i had my friend go outside and he didn't see anything. i seen this before on my tv screen. it eventually disappeared and i am confused of what it is and why is it there.
content.summary: Hovered by my car outside my home.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking tonight and saw 5 orbs come from the east, hover together, and then take off north. they moved back and forth and some up and down before taking off to the north.  this occurred around 9:30 tonight. around 9 just my daughter and i were walking and we saw one orb. right away we observed that the light, which was yellow, and the object's movement seemed unusual. we didn't think much about it. but then my husband and i saw several more orbs and that's when we started to conjecture about what they were.
content.summary: Several orbs with yellow lights came from east, hovered, then quickly moved north

content.detailedDescription: My dad was working about 20 miles south of pacos texas, in reeves county. he had  seen a deer and wanted to take pictures of it while it was running strait away from his position. he then proceeded to look at the pictures, and on the 17th or 18th photo he noticed a strange object in the sky in the picture. he couldn't see it with his naked eye.
content.summary: Seen in one out of about 20 pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok no ano de 1984 eu morava em uma fazendana paraíba brasil, em uma noite enluarada vi um circulo por trás de uma nuvpor trás de uma nuvem, perguntei para meu avô se existia mais de uma lua foi quando outros objetos apareceram e eram muitos uns 30 eu diria ficaram parados e depois de uns 20 minutos partiram em uma velocidade espantosa em formação um do lado do outro e outros atrás e dos lados.
caso 2
eu estava sozinho já era por volta de 17:00pm e meu avô tinha ido pra cidade que ficava a uns 10 km da fazenda, eu estava sentado em uma cadeira na varanda e foi quando passou por cima da casa da fazenda um objeto prateado voando baixo e só fazia um pequeno zumbido, posou a cerca de uns 200 metros em nossas terras fiquei muito curioso e fui ate ele para ver o que era tal objeto e quando cheguei no ponto onde ele desceu não havia nada lá.Procurei por cerca de 10 minutos verifiquei nas arvores e não o encontrei, voltei para o ponto inicial mas sempre olhando para trás a cada passo, senteime na cadeira da varanda sem tirar os olhos do local e foi quando ele surgiu novamente subiu até a altura de uma montanha e arrancou em uma velocidade fora dos padrões daqui da terra.
caso 3
era dezembro e como era costume nos finais de anos os meus tios e tias viajavam de são paulo brasil para vizitar os meus avós e vieram em grupos primeiro minha tia magnolia, minha tia marliete 2 primos e 3 primas. durante a noite fomos convidados pra jantar na casa de um vizinho durante o percurso pelo caminho vi algo que parecia ser uma estrela muito brilhante e parei pra olhar foi quando em um movimento ela desceu era bem enorme e ficou perto de nossas cabeças, corremos pra casa do vizinho e lá já estavam todos chorando e orando dizendo que era um sinal do fim dos tempos. aquilo era enorme e mudava de cor pude ver que havia contornos como se fosse janelas ficou por cerca de 40 minutos ou mais até desaparecer.
caso 4
eu já estava morando aqui em são paulo era meados de 1997 e cursava teatro em uma tarde logo após chegar do trabalho tomei um banho deitei no sofá e decorava o texto de uma peca teatral,havia visita na sala onde eu estava no sofá e era muito converseiro tava difícil decorar o texto. de repente senti algo tocando meu abdômen e aquilo provocava um serto ardor olhei e vi uma criatura pequena com cerca de 1,20metros com as maos em meu abdômen fiquei paralisado queria gritar e não podia e a ardência aumentara a ponto de ficar insuportável vi que tinha olhos grandes contornos do nariz e boca parecia nevoa e ele me encarou saiu se movimentando rapidamente passou por entre as visitas e foi em direção a cozinha e sumiu, levantei me e perguntei pras visitas vocês viram?Deram uma gargalhada como se eu estivesse louco. deitei novamente no sofá e fiquei pensando e novamente senti aquela mesma sensação se repetiu tudo novamente e dessa vez ele foi em direção a cozinha passou por todos e entrou na parede pude ver pq dessa vez fui atrás e ele estava parado próximo da parede me encarou e entrou nela.
coloco me a inteira disposição para testes ou hipnose regressiva para saber o que são essas coisas pq nos primeiros relatos que fiz sei que eram ovnis. obrigado
content.summary: In 1984 eu morava em uma fazenda com meus avós e em uma noite vi que havia um circulo por trás de uma nuvem e logo surgiu mais de 30 desses objetos e poucos dias depois surgiu um enorme que ficou sobre nossas cabeças por cerca de 40 minutos e era enorme

content.detailedDescription:
My mom, son and i were on vacation with 7 friends from costa rica.  we went on a bus tour to nicaragua. on the last (4th) day we went to the volcano at masaya in nicaragua. volcano masaya is considered by the locals as one of the 7 doors to hell. there are 3 calderas, one active and 2 inactive. my son and i walked to the rim of one of the inactive calderas. he was taking pictures the whole time we were there. the camera he has is a nikon coolpix aw110. the camera is a hd camera with gps capabilities. the gps feature was turned on when the pictures were taken. the picture i'm submitting is a panoramic picture. he started from the right, pushed the start button and panned left to produce the picture. in the right 3rd of the picture, you can see the object. we (he) did not see the object until i started reviewing the pictures on the way back to costa rica. from the time the picture was taken till the time i spotted the object on the camera, the whole group never broke up. when i viewed the picture, i looked at my son and kiddingly said he took a picture of a ufo. he laughed till he saw the picture. we passed the camera around and everyone including the bus driver (11 people total) viewed the picture. since we stayed together as a group, everyone can verify the authenticity of the situation. when we arrived back to our place in costa rica, we viewed the picture on a non hd tv with a rca jack connection. we determined it was a bug or something uneventful because of the fuzziness of the picture. it was not till i returned home and hooked the camera up with a hd connection to a hd tv did i change my mind about it being a bug or something explainable. the object looks like one of the lifting body aircraft from 30 years ago but without the vertical rudders. i am a respected 58 year old department manager at a new car dealership and my son is a 19 year old eagle scout. i wish we had noticed the object while there, but my son's hand would have been in the way when he started taking the picture and i was 30 feet away from him looking in a different direction. the first picture is a picture of the tv screen with a close up of the object. the second picture is the actual panoramic picture and the third one is a panoramic picture of the whole area including the active caldera. i hope you can determine what the object is by these pictures and will be waiting to hear back from your group. 
thanks
content.summary: Did not witness - first saw the object when we viewed the pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home and had to pee . i live on a dirt road . when i turned off the main road and went a short distance up the dirt road i stopped and got out to pee . i looked down the road towards a neighbors trailer . hovering over the trailer at treetop level facing me was a dark triangular shape w/three white lights , one on each corner . i thought to myself ( cool , so that's what a triangle ufo looks like ). the trailer was 70 or 80 feet long. the ufo was a bit shorter ( 50 feet ? ). i jumped in the car and sped to the corner by the trailer . when i looked up it had turned to my left and was slowly floating away . i could no longer see the white lights but now it had red tail lights like a car . the back of the craft looked like it had nine sections wide and two sections high . the end sections top and bottom looked like exaust ports . the next two sections top and bottom looked like red tail lights . then the middle three sections looked like exaust ports .The width of each section was two to three times the hight . i thought  ( i never heard about a triangle with taillights ). it moved very slow and (window down now )made no sound .I slowly followed it to my house and watched it go over the tree line as i got out of my car and went inside . i never thought to try for a picture , but it was between two and four am and dark . so i couldn't have anyway .I went inside and said to my friend who was house sitting " i just saved my neighbor from a vicious anal probing ! " . i told him the story and we laughed . then the next day i told my neighbor . then i never really thought about it that much after that . like it was no big deal . but now that i think about it now , it really was quite incredible . and i wonder why i was so sedate .
content.summary: Saw triangle w/three white lights hovering over trailer faceing me at tree top level . looked down , drove fast to corner , looked up . triangle was floating away ,no sound , and red tail lights . and no more white lights .

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was only 8 but i remember driving home from my grandmas house  in winnipeg heading to our home landmark .  i remember leaning my head back looking out back window i saw what i remember to look like a star destroyer from star wars above us it was triangular and lights under right over the highway.  i always thought it was from watching the star wars movie on tv . but my mom worked for revenue canada and my dad sold insurance we just built a new house then in january we moved to ontario my parents nvr had jobs like they did i never knew why they moved . it also seemed like we were home very late
content.summary: Overhead large triangle over highway silent

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo report has nothing to do with any type of et beings or craft.

this report does have to do with a possible test flight of an unknown type of air craft with the most likely point of origin being edwards air force base.

on july 31, 2015, two "con-trails" were observed to originate from the area of edwards air force base and return to that area. simply put, they did a "u" turn over the city of placentia, ca and returned in the direction of edwards air force base. "to the north".

an important point is that civilian air craft, flying at cruising altitude, were consistently observed not to produce "con-trails" during the time frame before, during and after this event. in 40+ years of observing this air space, i have never seen one con trail come from the north, make a "u" turn and return to the north. the fact that two such "con-trails" occurred in a time frame that allowed both to be caught on video and still pictures in full and plain sight of incoming traffic to lax may be of some importance.

i believe this to be more of a military test than anything else. this  maybe the precursor to a public announcement of a significant announcement of flight capability than anything else, but i also believe that this is what mufon was created to investigate.

i must admit that i have seen some tv programs that speculate on the existence of the aurora program. please understand that a "chain of pearls" pattern was observed in the "con trail" only when the observed wind aloft was perpendicular (or approximated) to the travel of the craft. the prevailing high altitude winds were clearly flowing from south to north. the chain of pearls effect was witnessed when the craft was traveling west to east. to me this means that the effect could be produced by wind shear. on the other hand it could be produced by the propulsion system and that traveling directly into or away from the wind "masks" the nature of the propulsion system.    

i do have some video on my cell phone and some still's. see some of the attached, the quality is not great. you have access to my phone if you want it.
content.summary: Domestic air traffic at altitude along normal air traffic routes did not produce "con-trails". two "horse sew" shaped "con-trails" were produced by one or more objects that originated from the edwards air force base area.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to have a smoke on my front porch.  i n stepped out into my yard to try and see the sunset.  when i looked i saw a star like glowing orb, object in the sky.  i knew it wasn't a star or planet because it was to bright in the sun setting sky.  plus to the east, no other stars were viewable at that time.  it was off to the west, and appeared to be hovering over the lake berryessa fire.  at least it appeared that way from my view in northern sacramento, ca. i took a photo and it's attached to this report.  the second picture is the image enhanced by a friend who i shared the image with.  right before i called my wife outside to view the ufo, i saw a commercial plane flew in its extreme foreground, making its approach to the sacramento airport.  when the object was stationary at first, than bobbed side to side for awhile, i called my wife out to take a look, that's when the objet started to fall like a leaf.  it would stop after falling and go back to bobbing in the sky.  after it had fallen, from my perspective like 2 inches.. it then hovered for a minute and then disappeared...  no flashing when it did dissappear, no trial showing the direction. it's like it went invisible cause it didn't reappear anywhere else in the sky.  while my viewing of the object appeared to be a constant light, my wife viewed to object as blinking but blinking a 'gold' color.
content.summary: Looked like a star, hovered near lake berreyessa fire

content.detailedDescription:
On july 28th 2015 as i was flying from nyc to los angeles i saw 8 ufos. we were at approx 35,000 feet going 521 mph (ground speed). i was looking at our flight path on my phone and watching the terrain below. i have never in my life seen an alien or a ufo that i know of. they appeared to have light coming off them from every side and angle that they turned and moved- the color of gold as though the sun were reflecting off them. it was the middle of a very sunny day just over arizona maybe a couple hundred miles past sedona. me, the woman next to me and the little boy in front of me saw it... no one else said a thing. it was baffling, frightening in it's newness to my mind and incredibly beautiful. at first it appeared that they were traveling towards us and would possibly cross our path at an incredibly close angle (as in they were below us and appeared to be moving upward and then would cross our path in a t). i almost thought i was seeing missiles. they may have actually just been holding position... honestly until they turned and started moving in the opposite direction i couldn't tell if they were traveling or stationary. at that point there were three in a triangle formation and they held that position for several minutes and then began moving away from us. as they moved away they danced across the sky for over 10 minutes going in and out of formations and even at times disappearing down to 3-5 in number until at the last minute 8 of them appeared and spread out over approx a 1-4 mile radius in a straight line across the horizon. i think they were 5,000 to 10,000 feet below us. all but two disappeared and held a steady formation in the sky until i couldn't see them any more. that lasted at least 60 seconds to 120 seconds.
i took a photo to document the area and the last two lights that were visible to my eyes but they are not visible in the cell phone picture from what i can tell upon trying to zoom in and see them. i'm including a photo of where we crossed over sedona, az so you can see region and then the desert picture was where i was seeing the ufos. i think the ufos were near the mojave. in that photo they were to the far right just where the mountains and horizon meet.
content.summary: On july 28th 2015 as i was flying from nyc to los angeles i saw 8 ufos. they appeared to have light coming off them from every side and angle that they turned and moved.

content.detailedDescription: About 2 weeks ago on a saturday night at about 3 am me and my girlfriend decide to go to revere beach and just relax on the sand and look at the stars. the moment we got comfortable and was looking up at the stars over the ocean we started to see what looked like stars moving around spontaneously in every direction. some interacted with other star like objects flying around, some moved in between other star like objects as they went.. they would stop in a dime in mid flight after moving so fast. so we go back the following night just to make sure we saw what we saw and there it goes again happening already. so last night at 1 am we go out there but this time i brought my green laser and try to communicated with them to see what would happen and they started to follow the path of my laser in the sky one when i clicked the laser 5 times the star like objects blinked 5 times so i aim the laser at the ground next to me looked up and noticed one of the star like objects direct itself right above me. 3 times ive been out there 3 times i saw at least 15 - 20 star like ufos. i believe anyone can go out there any night between 10am and 4 am and if they lay or stand on a dark spot on the beach they will witness what i did i guarantee it. please if you have people in the area send one to revere beach at night at the time frame i gave you. if possible i will even go with them.. i wish i had a good enough camera to record it.
content.summary: Me and my girlfriend observed over 20 ufos over the ocean at revere beach

content.detailedDescription: Had gone outside for a cigarette, and looked to the east and saw an object that at 1st was speeding towards the ground at a 35 degree angle then slowed and short flame tail was reduced slowly, the event was under 5 seconds in total but it appeared to be heading directly for lakehurst/dix/mcquire air force base in southern new jersey. the object made no sound yet the fact that it slowed down because gravity would either maintain or increase speed as the ground approached this thing actually slowed as if to be landing, the surface was not visible but the emission off the tail left a tell tale trail.
content.summary: Object left short flame & slowed as ground approached
